import { useContext } from 'react' import './SpotCard.css' import { Link, useHistory } from 'react-router-dom' import { SearchContext } from '../../context/Search' const SpotCard = ({spot}) => { const history = useHistory() const {searchResults, setSearchResults, searchedSpots, setSearchedSpots, searchQuery, setSearchQuery} = useContext(SearchContext) const handleClick = ()=>{ setSearchResults([]) setSearchedSpots([]) setSearchQuery('') } return(

{spot.city}, {spot.state}

${spot.price} night
{(spot.avgRating>0)&&
{spot.avgRating}
}
) } export default SpotCard
